articles.author: Ben Berkowitz
articles.title: European, Asian shippers cut U.S. off as tariff deadline nears - Axios
articles.description: More than 1.3 billion packages entered the U.S. in 2024 under the tariff exemption.
articles.content:
Catch up quick: In late July, President Trump formally revoked the de minimis exemption, which excluded packages worth $800 or less from tariffs.
